implementation.useCase: Hume AI uses Claude to power EVI, their voice-to-voice AI platform that enables natural, emotionally intelligent voice conversations. The platform can detect nuances in a user's tone of voice and generate responses with appropriate emotional resonance, while supporting various personalities, accents, and speaking styles.
implementation.problem: Traditional AI approaches to understanding human emotions were reductive and missed over 80% of the information present in human expressions. Hume AI sought to build AI systems optimized for human wellbeing that could understand emotional nuances in voice interactions.
implementation.integrationMethod: Integration of Claude with EVI (Hume's Voice-to-Voice AI Platform)

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude's eloquence and personality make it enjoyable for users to interact with
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: "Claude is very eloquent," said Cowen. "It has a really good personality that people enjoy talking to."

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude's ability to follow complex prompts was crucial for diverse use cases
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Claude's reliability in following complex prompts was crucial for diverse use cases, while its emotional intelligence excelled at interpreting user expressions.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude excels at interpreting user expressions
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Claude's reliability in following complex prompts was crucial for diverse use cases, while its emotional intelligence excelled at interpreting user expressions.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude can handle long conversations effectively
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: The model's extensive context handling for long conversations and built-in safety features reduced development overhead, making it ideal for powering Hume's voice platform.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude's safety features reduced development overhead
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: The model's extensive context handling for long conversations and built-in safety features reduced development overhead, making it ideal for powering Hume's voice platform.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude adapts to complex personality traits throughout long conversations
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: "Our users say that they love Claude 3.5 Sonnet, and find its personality fits really well with EVI. One customer is using EVI for immersive coaching simulations, helping managers practice delivering feedback to a defensive direct report. They've found Sonnet through EVI adapts to complex personality traits throughout a long conversation," said Cowen.

technicalDetails.architecture: EVI (Hume's Voice-to-Voice AI Platform) integrated with Claude to enable voice-to-voice AI conversations with emotional intelligence
technicalDetails.promptEngineering: Prompt caching is used to reduce costs and decrease latency
technicalDetails.solutions: Integration of Claude with EVI to create emotionally intelligent voice interactions
technicalDetails.scale: Over 1 million distinct conversations, nearly 2 million minutes of interaction time, hundreds of thousands of custom EVI configurations
